PyDataSource.config_check.ConfigCheck.get_alert_info¶

ConfigCheck.get_alert_info(typ='error')[source]¶

Get dict of alert info for each detector

Parameters:typ (str) – type of alert info [default = ‘error’] options include [‘error’,’value’,’valid_setting’,’doc’,’unit’]
